p: In the hope of gaining more insight into the formation of both isomers of 1, the reaction of [K([18]crown‐6)][Cp*Fe(C 10H 8)] with L was monitored by 31P{ 1H} NMR spectroscopy at 273 K. The initial spectrum showed immediate, full consumption of ligand L, and formation of two major new groups of resonances at ca. −25 and −42 ppm. 20 Only after approximately 30 minutes did signals attributable to 1‐σ and 1‐π become readily discernible, growing in steadily over the course of several hours with concomitant loss of the intermediate resonances.
